function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 spread indoors","Impact":"Risk of infection in enclosed spaces","Mitigation":"Increase natural ventilation and air circulation, use touch-free systems, and install barriers","Technologies":"Automatic windows, touch-free systems, antibacterial fabrics, sound-activated elevators","People":"Occupants in enclosed spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Virus droplets staying in the air","Impact":"Risk of prolonged exposure to virus droplets","Mitigation":"Improve natural ventilation and use touch-free systems","Technologies":"Automatic windows, touch-free systems, sound-activated elevators","People":"Occupants in enclosed spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Contact surface contamination","Impact":"Risk of virus spreading through contact surfaces","Mitigation":"Use of antibacterial fabrics and coatings, touch-free systems, and barriers","Technologies":"Antibacterial fabrics, touch-free systems, glass barriers","People":"Occupants in enclosed spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
